text:
<@U2H3TT8F2> I already opened a support ticket but figured you guys might know more about the change.

Basically this is what's happening now:
so the other values were from before the change, which now causes IDs to be outputted instead of a url
I tried to do a temp workaround (not sustainable regardless as you can only call file_by_id 10 times per page) but even then the file URL returned isn't valid and it goes to a 404
I have a dynamic page which references a custom object as a datasource and this whole change breaks the module using it

here's a sample output of file_by_id which returns a 404:
<https://dmcc.ae/hubfs/crm-properties-file-values/MFTL%20France%20-%20Event%20page%20banner%20(2).png>
